text:
Alfred Adler Quotes on Personality
• “The only normal people are the ones you don't know very well.”
• “Meanings are not determined by situations, but we determine ourselves by the meanings we give to
situations.”
• “Empathy is seeing with the eyes of another, listening with the ears of another, and feeling with the
heart of another.”
• “We are influenced not by facts but by our interpretation of the facts.”
